briefdescription.para: Length of string including NUL. Needed by LC_verify.h.

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for LC_SampleAPReq that will sample the selected actionpoints. The start and end arguments define which actionpoint(s) the command will sample. If both the start and end arguments are set to LC_ALL_ACTIONPOINTS, the command will be interpreted as a request to sample all actionpoints (heritage). Otherwise, the start index must be less than or equal to the end index, and both must be within the bounds of the actionpoint table.

parameterdescription.para: The first actionpoint to sample (zero based actionpoint table index)
The last actionpoint to sample (zero based actionpoint table index)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: This function is called by table services when a validation of the actionpoint definition table is required

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the table data to validate

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for actionpoint processing that will sample a single actionpoint and handle the result as needed

parameterdescription.para: The actionpoint number to sample (zero based actionpoint definition table index)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for actionpoint processing that evaluates the reverse polish notation (RPN) equation for the specified actionpoint and returns the result

parameterdescription.para: The actionpoint number to evaluate (zero based actionpoint definition table index)

simplesect.title: Description
simplesect.para: Support function for actionpoint definition table validation that checks a reverse polish notation (RPN) equation for possible errors.

parameterdescription.para: A pointer where to store the equation index value if an error is detected
A pointer where to store the equation stack depth value if an error is detected
Equation index value where error was found. Not modified if return code is LC_ADTVAL_NO_ERR
Equation stack depth value where error found. Not modified if return code is LC_ADTVAL_NO_ERR
